CustomField.formula: if ( OR(RecordType.Id = LEFT($Label.OT_RecordTypeID_DDR,15),RecordType.Id = left($Label.OT_RecordTypeID_DDS,15)) , if ( AND(NOT(ISBLANK( EndDate )),NOT(ISBLANK( StartDate)) ,EndDate>StartDate) , (EndDate - StartDate)*24*60 , NULL ) , if ( AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Date_Heure_Fin__c )) ,NOT(ISBLANK( Date_Heure_Depart__c )) ,Date_Heure_Fin__c>Date_Heure_Depart__c ) , (Date_Heure_Fin__c - Date_Heure_Depart__c)*24*60 , NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Dur√©e Intervention(Minutes)
